p: In a dereplication approach, the flavones isovitexin ( 3), luteolin ( 6), isoorientin ( 7) and luteolin-7- O-glucoside ( 8) were unambiguously identified in a methanol extract of the aerial parts of E. laurentii ( Ateba et al., 2014b) and 2″- O-α- l-rhamnosyl-6- C-fucosyl-3′- O-methyl-luteolin ( 9) was isolated from the same extract ( Ateba et al., 2016a). Vitexin ( 4) and robusflavone C ( 5) were extracted from an ethanol fraction of twigs of E. robustum ( Awouafack et al., 2018).
